original: This character has been chosen to succeed a Patrician in running the family business.
translation: 此角色已被选作继承贵人头衔，以期其经营家业。

original: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§! vassalizes lords of [Root.GetPossPronoun] religion and takes all other titles in the §Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!.\n
translation: §Y[Root.GetTitledFirstName]§!使得信奉[Root.GetPossPronoun]宗教的各领主臣服并取得§Y[This.GetFullBaseName]§!内的其他头衔。\n

original: This succession law is the opposite of the far more common Primogeniture. With Ultimogeniture, the youngest child inherits.
translation: 幼子继承法，此继承法与更为常见的长子继承法相对，幼子继承法规定由最幼子有继承权。

original: The ruler and all vassals at one and two ranks below can nominate an heir - the Tanist - from among the members of the ruler's dynasty. Vassals will tend to favor older members from other branches of the family, especially claimants.
translation: 凯尔特酋长选举制，领主以及比领主低一至二等级的封臣皆可提名继承人，即储副——储副是从领主的王朝的成员中选出来的。封臣们更愿意从家族的其他支系中选择年长者，尤其是宣称者。

original: The Theodosian Walls were built during the reign of Emperor Theodosius II in the early 5th century, but they still remain some of the most formidable fortifications ever built by human hands.
translation: 狄奥多西城墙建于五世纪初，罗马皇帝狄奥多西二世统治时期，但这些城墙现在仍是人类建造的最易守难攻的堡垒之一。

original: A small collection of shipyards and armories centered around the docks of the Republic's capital.
translation: 一小批集中修建于共和国首都的码头周围的造船厂和兵工厂

original: A heavily fortified collection of shipyards and armories centered around the docks of the Republic's capital.
translation: 一批集中修建于共和国首都的码头周围的防卫森严的造船厂和兵工厂

original: This heavily fortified collection of shipyards and armories is nothing less than an industrial complex centered around the docks of the Republic's capital.
translation: 这些守卫森严的造船厂、兵工厂完全不亚于一个围绕着共和国首都码头的军工复合体。

original: As [Root.GetTitle], use the powers of your office to usurp Trade Posts from a rival family.
translation: 作为[Root.GetTitle]，用你职位的权力侵夺敌对家族的贸易节点。

original: Petition the [Root.Liege.GetTitle] for some Trade Posts in the name of equity.
translation: 以公平的名义向[Root.Liege.GetTitle]请求贸易节点。

original: You order your daughter to end this disgraceful affair.
translation: 你命令你的女儿停止可耻的行为。

original:
The [From.GetOnlyDynastyName] family has so little, while the wealth of the other patrician families grows ever larger. Surely this unfair distribution of wealth cannot be in the Republic's best interest. Would you consider transferring some Trade Posts from another family into our capable hands?

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
[From.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族现在已一贫如洗，然而其他贵人家族却财源滚滚。毋庸置疑，这种不公平的财富分配不符合共和国的最大利益。你能考虑一下在你力所能及的范围内转移贸易节点吗？

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Very well, let's see what we can do...
translation: 很好！看看我们能做什么……

original:
Your petition is denied. If you want more Trade Posts, you will have to build them yourself. I won't let you steal the spoils of other people's hard work.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你的请求已被拒绝。你只能自己建造贸易节点。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: You inform the Patrician that he will have to part with some of his Trade Posts.
translation: 你告知该贵人，他得割舍一些贸易节点了。

original:
The [FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName] family is not doing well, to the detriment of the Republic as a whole. As such, I consider it my duty as [From.GetTitle] to get them back on their feet. Regretfully, this means granting them a few of your many Trade Posts. I am sure you understand the necessity of these measures.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
整体而言，[FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族在处理对共和国不利的事务方面做的不尽如人意。因此，我认为我该履行我作为[From.GetTitle]的职责，让他们滚回去。遗憾的是，这意味着您要把您众多贸易节点中的一部分授予他们。我相信您能理解这么做的必要性吧。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: You have no choice but to grant his request.
translation: 你已穷途末路，只能答应他的请求！

original:
It seems I am left with little choice. I am sure the Trade Posts will suffer under their incompetent rule, but if you think this is best, I will transfer them over to this family of paupers and malcontents.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
似乎我已别无选择。我相信，在他们昏庸的统治下，贸易节点将会处于水深火热之中。如果你认为这是最好的选择，那么我会把这些贸易节点转手给这个贫民和反叛者的家族。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: You inform the Patrician that his request has been granted.
translation: 你告知贵人，他的请求已获批准。

original:
Your petition has some merit, and I have decided to grant you several Trade Posts that previously belonged to the [FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName] family. Use them well.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
你的请求值得称赞。我决定授予你以前属于[FromFrom.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族的贸易节点。好好使用它们吧！

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original:
While I don't deny that your request has some merit, it seems there just aren't any Trade Posts available for transfer to your family. I forwarded a request on your behalf to another patrician, but he wasn't entirely... cooperative. Nevertheless, I wish you the best of luck in any future endeavors, old friend.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
无可否认，你的请求值得称赞，但我似乎已没有能够转手给你家族的贸易节点了。尽管我代表你向一个贵人提出请求，但他并不是很愿意合作。尽管如此，我还是祝福你，我的老朋友，祝你将来能够通过努力，得偿所愿。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: You inform the Patrician that you did your best.
translation: 你告知贵人你已竭尽全力。

original: You present your demand for several Trade Posts.
translation: 你提出了几个贸易节点的要求。

original:
In my continuing efforts to safeguard the security of the Republic, I think it best if my family assumed direct control over several strategic Trade Posts currently owned by House [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]. Thank you for your understanding.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我为保卫共和国而不懈奋斗，我认为如果能让我的家族直接控制现在被[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]家族控制的几个具有战略意义的贸易节点就再好不过了。谢谢你能理解。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: Surely this behavior is beneath a [From.GetTitle].
translation: 毋庸置疑，这一行为有失[From.GetTitle]之身份。

original: Let's not be hasty, my dear [From.GetFirstName]...
translation: 机不可失，时不再来。我亲爱的[From.GetFirstName]……

original:
Very well. Take the Trade Posts and be damned, but know this: one day the boot will be on the other foot. Enjoy this while it lasts, my dear [Root.GetTitle].

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
好得很！拿走这些贸易节点吧！可恶！你可要知道，风水轮流转！且行且珍惜吧，我亲爱的[Root.GetTitle]。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: With your high level of stewardship, you can easily prove that the Trade Posts will do far better under your continued rule.
translation: 你继续管理这些贸易节点，相信在你精心经营下，它们将会远比现在繁荣，这是毋庸置疑的。

original:
As much as I would like to comply with your demand, these Trade Posts will serve the Republic far better under my enlightened stewardship. If you wish, I can provide ample evidence of how I have improved their management. I cannot in good conscience transfer them away from my control.

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我尽量遵照你的要求。这些贸易节点在我开明的经营下将会更好地服务于共和国。我改善管理方式的例证可以说不胜枚举。把它们转手出去我难以做到问心无愧。

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: You use your diplomatic skill to point out the folly of this request, and how it threatens the very foundation of the Republic.
translation: 你用你折冲樽俎的高超技巧指出他的请求简直是愚不可及，而且这也会严重威胁共和国的基础。

original:
My dear [Root.GetFirstName], permit me to share some of my insights into the art of diplomacy. As [Root.GetTitle], you depend on the continued goodwill of the other patricians. How do you think they will react if it becomes public knowledge that you might arbitrarily confiscate their property?

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我亲爱的[Root.GetFirstName]，请允许我分享我多年来纵横捭阖的一些微小经验。作为[Root.GetTitle]，你应该与其他贵人睦邻友好。如果你随意没收他们财产的行为变得路人皆知，他们会作何反应？

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]

original: With your skill at intrigue, you have already taken steps to ensure the continued loyalty of the men serving at these Trade Posts.
translation: 在你精心布局下，你已步步为营，稳扎稳打地确保了那些供职于贸易节点的臣属们对你忠贞不渝。

original:
I'm afraid those Trade Posts will do you little good, [Root.GetTitle]. Through various means of intrigue, I have ensured the complete loyalty of all men stationed within them. They have orders to burn them to the ground if [Root.GetOnlyDynastyName] rule over them is ever threatened...

Signed,
[From.GetTitledName]
translation:
我担心您很难从这些贸易节点中获益，[Root.GetTitle]。在我的精心布局之下，我能确保那些供职于贸易节点的人忠贞不二。我给他们下了命令，如果统治他们的[Root.GetOnlyDynastyName]收到威胁，他们就会把这些贸易节点夷为平地……

此致，
[From.GetTitledName]
